rules.name: Training References Required
rules.description: All SOPs must reference required training materials or competency assessments
rules.rule_text: Document must include references to associated training materials, competency assessments, or qualification requirements for personnel executing the procedures.

rules.name: Risk Assessment Documentation
rules.description: Documents should include or reference risk assessment for critical processes
rules.rule_text: For critical processes, document should include or reference risk assessment documentation identifying potential risks and mitigation strategies.

rules.name: Equipment Calibration References
rules.description: SOPs involving equipment must reference calibration requirements
rules.rule_text: When procedures involve measurement equipment or instruments, the SOP must reference calibration requirements, schedules, and acceptance criteria.

rules.name: Data Integrity Checkpoints
rules.description: Validation protocols must include specific data integrity checkpoints
rules.rule_text: Validation protocols must include explicit data integrity checkpoints, verification steps, and electronic record controls at critical process steps.

rules.name: Custom Rule 1
rules.description: All document have date year more than 2024
rules.rule_text: All document have date year more than 2024
